post.body: BTW The quick cam we are using is the Logitech Quickcam Orbit and it does track your movements. Sorry took so long.
Small world, isn't it? I meet people from Iowa or with family in Iowa all over during my travels.
It was only cold until we set up the Ice House and fired up the heater. Then it got nice and toasty. Really not that bad.
I'll swap your 10 degrees for our -9 this morning. Welcoming a warm spell for Christmas. ;-)
I would much rather be here than Chicago. I've dealt with that Chicago traffic and weather. Not fun at all!
Near Storm Lake. Not sure how bad Des Moines got it. Had 20 inches of soft snow to be blow around here and it did!
Just checked and they cleaned out the suspicious ones apparently. I don't watch my follower counts.
We started cutting way back on listings until right before New Years. No sense in giving the dog more $$$$'s.
Took youngest ice fishing in -5 temps yesterday. Didn't dare take picture then cause it was really bad.
Did you check out that snow storm pic I posted? I was driving back from town in my Suburban. Got worse on Sunday.
How have things been with you and your sales? Dare I ask?
Been trying to keep from freezing my @$$ off. Leaving today and will probably return on #Christmas Day. ;-(
OUCH! A tripple play video. Can imagine the content already. Have fun with this one!
Do me a big favor and keep this white crap up your way and don't be sending any more down here.
Retweet ~ Dave just made a Twitter Group at http://twittgroups.com/group/ebayandbeyond for our ebayandbeyond group.
http://twitpic.com/uo09 - Picture taken during blizzard on Saturday, December 20, 2008. The winds increased to around 45 mph on Sunday.
Check out the Illinois Senate Seat that has just been listed on the Free ebay Auction Advertising! http://www.storepromoter.info/auction.php
Have you seen my twitpic from Saturday. The weather kept us hunkered down. http://twitpic.com/uo09 - The Winter Wonderland called Iowa
Good Morning Twitter friends
http://twitpic.com/uo09 - The Winter Wonderland called Iowa
